title: Give Me Something (David Guetta song)
text: "Give Me Something" is a <a href="House%20Music">house</a> song performed by French <a href="Disc%20jockey">DJ</a> <a href="David%20Guetta">David Guetta</a>, featuring vocals from singer-songwriter <a href="Barbara%20Tucker">Barbara Tucker</a>. The track was released as the fourth <a href="single%20%28music%29">single</a> from his debut studio album, "<a href="Just%20a%20Little%20More%20Love">Just a Little More Love</a>". The single was only released in <a href="France">France</a>. No music video exists for the track.
